content: **crocheted jumper in drops cotton merino piece is crocheted top down in treble crochets with raglan and short sleeves size s - xxxl ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #bluecoastsweater drops design pattern cm-157 yarn group b ---------------------------------------------------------- **size** s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl **yarn** drops cotton merino from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 400-450-500-550-600-650 g colour 30 sea glass **crochet hook** drops crochet hook size 4 5 mm **crochet gauge** 16 treble crochets in width and 8 row vertically with hook size 4 5 mm = 10 x 10 cm note remember that hook size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to larger hook if you have too few stitches on 10 cm switch to smaller hook
